channel.title: Aureliano Untangling
channel.itunes:subtitle: Secular Dharma
channel.itunes:author: Aureliano Nava
channel.itunes:summary: Secular Dharma and spritituality, meditation, mental health, society, lots on suffering, more on suffering, end of suffering, all things human and dog.
channel.description: This spiritual thing can get kind of trippy and wierd. Lots of nonesense and snake oil out there and if your're not cautious you might end up buying more than you afford. I intend to Untagle the spiritual path for you by giving it to you straight, as it should be, on the rocks.
